LocaleSwitcher.title: Welcome to Spelling Bee Challenge!
LocaleSwitcher.label: Select Language
LocaleSwitcher.description: Letters can be used more than once. Only singular nouns and present tense verbs are allowed.
LocaleSwitcher.introDescription: In this exciting spelling game, your goal is to score 100 points to win. Hereâ€™s how it works:
LocaleSwitcher.introInitalTime: Initial Time: You start with 60 seconds.
LocaleSwitcher.introPointSystem: Points System: Earn points based on the length of the words you spell correctly.
LocaleSwitcher.introTimeBonus: Time Bonus: For every correct spelling, 15 seconds will be added to your remaining time.
LocaleSwitcher.introGoodLuck: Test your spelling skills and race against the clock to become the ultimate Spelling Bee Champion. Good luck!
